title: Textile, "Tantalus", 1913–17
medium:
Medium: silk 
Technique: block printed on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Small-scale pattern of sparsely arranged coiled serpents, fishes, and vases of curling foliage; (a) light blue and yellow on white; (b) light blue and yellow on black.
